tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    owner_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    blockchain_platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    token_id VARCHAR(100),
    trade_history JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255),
  blockchain_platform VARCHAR(255),
  owner_address VARCHAR(255),
  trading_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE owners (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  blockchain_platform VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT, 
  owner_id INT,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_ownership (
	ownership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	digital_asset_id INT,
	owner_address VARCHAR(255),
	ownership_start_date DATE,
	ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	digital_asset_id INT,
	transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
	transaction_value DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_trading_history (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id),
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR(20),
    trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_ownership (
    ownership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id),
    owner_name VARCHAR(50),
    ownership_date TIMESTAMP,
    ownership_status BOOLEAN
);
